body_html:
Thank you for the suggestion. Unfortunately, I can't access any other folder apart from my home folder and the build directory. In particular, I can't access /tmp[0], and the build fails.

[0] Well actually I can access tmp, but there is very limited amount of space available - the build fails with "no space left on device"

body:
Thank you for the suggestion. Unfortunately, I can't access any other folder apart from my home folder and the build directory. In particular, I can't access /tmp[0], and the build fails. 

[0] Well actually I can access tmp, but there is _very_ limited amount of space available - the build fails with "no space left on device"
